Posts.Content: Hi JMC04 Thanks for the advice. I am now on day 13 after my first FEC. I have not been too bad, felt sick and tired for the first 5 days. I went back to work full time on Monday and have felt fine. Round 2 is on 6th April and hoping it isn't cumulative and it's the same as the 1st round. Will let you know xx
Posts.Title: * * * MARCH 2017 Breast cancer chemo club * * *

Posts.Content: Hi I start my FEC treatment tomorrow. I don't know what to expect! How long does it take for side effects to happen? I have 3 - FEC then 3 - T and herceptin followed by radiotherapy.
